CSSAlign-items.summary: The CSS align-items property sets the {{cssxref("align-self")}} value on all direct children as a group. In Flexbox, it controls the alignment of items on the Cross Axis. In Grid Layout, it controls the alignment of items on the Block Axis within their Grid Areas.
